abstract: Jeff Chen delivers a puzzle with bite.
snippet: Jeff Chen delivers a puzzle with bite.
lead_paragraph: MONDAY'S PUZZLE - Happy Halloween, everybody! Have you all purchased your candy to dole out to trick-or-treaters? Anyone dressing up in costume for the holiday? Here on the East Coast, we're having a very snowy Halloween, and if I was going to dress up, it would most likely be as a Resentful Homeowner Who Is Getting Really Tired of Shoveling Her Walkway. On the other hand, I'm hoping there will be lots of chocolate left over to make it worth my while. There's always a silver lining, am I right?

headline.main: Monday: A Halloween Puzzle With Bite
